subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: DaShaun Wood scored 27 points and Will Graham hit four free throws in the last 12 seconds to lead Wright State past No. 19 Butler, 60-55, for the Horizon League postseason title.
snippet: DaShaun Wood scored 27 points and Will Graham hit four free throws in the last 12 seconds to lead Wright State past No. 19 Butler, 60-55, for the Horizon League postseason title.
